Plan for Cultural Exchange between DPRK and Cuba Signed
articles.content:
Plan for Cultural Exchange between DPRK and Cuba Signed 
    Pyongyang, May 5 (KCNA) -- A 2004-2006 plan for cultural exchange between governments of the DPRK and Cuba was signed in Havana on April 29.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK government cultural delegation led by Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and from the Cuban side Foreign Minister Felipe Perez Roque and officials concerned.
